ValidationRule.description: Samples Collected must be Yes prior to Submitted a Claim.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TEXT(Origin) = 'Owner', TEXT(Origin) = 'Contractor', TEXT(Origin) = 'Distributor' ), OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), OR( TEXT( Samples_Collected__c) = '', TEXT( Samples_Collected__c) = 'No' ), TEXT( Claim_Stage__c ) = 'Submitted' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure Samples are collected before Submitting a Claim.
